about_the_game:
The This Is Not Your House Original Soundtrack was created by Composer Jamison Miles Jackson. Four of the tracks were taken directly from his work on previous projects with Trash Eyes that were never released; one is a remix of the track NOISE from his prior band Betamail, the other eleven songs are various pieces of music he's created over the years and frankensteined together to make this gloriously bizarre original soundtrack!

Musical artist [pseudonym] was the other half of the band Betamail and made the track NOISE from which "Noise Instrumental" was later created.

[pseudonym] directly contributed to the song - "Gloommare" Which was originally created for a short horror film in 2020 (Malady) which has never been released.

Cody Tierson edited three of Jamison Miles Jackson's songs from the unreleased horror short film Malady; and a variety of additional sound effects together, to make the track - orifice

Four of the tracks were taken directly from his work on previous projects with Trash Eyes that were never released; one is a remix of the track NOISE from his prior band Betamail, the other eleven songs are various pieces of music he's created over the years and frankensteined together to make this gloriously bizarre original soundtrack!

Musical artist [pseudonym] was the other half of the band Betamail and made the track NOISE from which "Noise Instrumental" was later created.

[pseudonym] directly contributed to the song - "Gloommare" Which was originally created for a short horror film in 2020 (Malady) which has never been released.

Cody Tierson edited three of Jamison Miles Jackson's songs from the unreleased horror short film Malady; and a variety of additional sound effects together, to make the track - orifice
